title: Problem with FPS
body: When I play League, It suddenly has about 7 - 10 fps and I don't know what is wrong with it. I reverted my new windows to the previous update but the client is still slow.

replies.body:
OS version, software, hardware, graphics driver, running software?

Have you attempted a repair of the client and a driver rollback?
everything is running fine, It's just league that is the problem. I reverted the new windows 10 update which made the computer faster but my League client is still running at 10 fps
I've been having the same issue - previously I have been getting more than 60FPS, but only recently I have 7-10 FPS.
Same on my side. The problem started yesterday (2018-06-02) after i had a small patch. Not sure if thats the problem but everything was fine before.
